articles.title: BREAKING: LPG cylinder prices June 1, 2022: Cooking gas prices slashed, check out how much you need to pay... - Zee News
articles.description: Bringing the much needed relief, the Oil Marketing companies on Wednesday, 1 June 2022, announced to reduce the prices of the 19 kg commercial cylinder. From today, the 19 kg commercial cylinder will be cheaper by Rs 135 cheaper.
